sn46.24:1.1: “Ayoniso, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppanno ceva kamacchando uppajjati, uppanno ca kamacchando bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati;
sn46.24:1.2: anuppanno ceva byapado uppajjati, uppanno ca byapado bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati;
sn46.24:1.3: anuppannanceva thinamiddham uppajjati, uppannanca thinamiddham bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati;
sn46.24:1.4: anuppannanceva uddhaccakukkuccam uppajjati, uppannanca uddhaccakukkuccam bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati;
sn46.24:1.5: anuppanna ceva vicikiccha uppajjati, uppanna ca vicikiccha bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati;
sn46.24:1.6: anuppanno ceva satisambojjhango nuppajjati, uppanno ca satisambojjhango nirujjhati …pe… anuppanno ceva upekkhasambojjhango nuppajjati, uppanno ca upekkhasambojjhango nirujjhati.
sn46.24:2.1: Yoniso ca kho, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppanno ceva kamacchando nuppajjati, uppanno ca kamacchando pahiyati;
sn46.24:2.2: anuppanno ceva byapado nuppajjati, uppanno ca byapado pahiyati;
sn46.24:2.3: anuppannanceva thinamiddham nuppajjati, uppannanca thinamiddham pahiyati;
sn46.24:2.4: anuppannanceva uddhaccakukkuccam nuppajjati, uppannanca uddhaccakukkuccam pahiyati;
sn46.24:2.5: anuppanna ceva vicikiccha nuppajjati, uppanna ca vicikiccha pahiyati.
sn46.24:3.1: Anuppanno ceva satisambojjhango uppajjati, uppanno ca satisambojjhango bhavanaparipurim gacchati …pe… anuppanno ceva upekkhasambojjhango uppajjati, uppanno ca upekkhasambojjhango bhavanaparipurim gacchati”ti.
